section.p: It is as though night has fallen suddenly in the middle of the day. Thunderheads hunch on the horizon like vast brooding crows. Lightning streaks yellow fire across the tortured sky.
‘Doomsday!’ shrieks the bosun. ‘Repent or be damned!’
